body: Indeed, it'd be great to have a different mode for `go tool trace` that just spits out a data file to load into trace viewer out of band; maybe `go tool trace && curl .../jsontrace` would suffice fro now, but something like a `go tool trace -out` flag would be a bit better.  I did consider opening a separate issue about the higher level usage pattern concern.  This issue is more towards "if you're going to do these sorts of things, here's a more maintainable way to do X" (gerrit submission coming Soon â„¢).
